userOverview: Inquisitive, energetic B.Sc. (Hons) graduate offering a strong foundation in software engineering and programming principals across multiple platforms
Experienced on writing highly maintainable and robust object-oriented code
Adapted at developing, designing, testing, debugging and installing software solutions while evaluating system feasibility
Passion for programming and ability to learn new technologies
Successful working experience in both team and self-directed settings

awardsSection: ACM International Collegiate Programming Contest Regional finalist in 2013, 2014 and 2017
Daffodil National Collegiate Programming Contest finalist in 2014
NSU National Collegiate Programming Contest finalist in 2018
SUB Inter University Programming Contest finalist in 2014, 2015 and 2017
BUET Inter University Programming Contest finalist in 2015
MBSTU Inter University Programming Contest finalist in 2017
International Space Apps Challenge finalist in 2015
Winner of IST Internal Programming Contest 2013
Winner of IST Internal Gaming Contest 2013
